pages.title: Kamen Rider Bravo
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_bravo)Sengoku Driver (Bravo)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Sengoku Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Haste$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength

pages.title: Kamen Rider Bravo
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Gaim Gaiden: Kamen Rider Gridon VS Kamen Rider Bravo (2020, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_bravo)Sengoku Driver (Bravo)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength III

pages.title: Kamen Rider Bravo
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)S.I.C. Hero Saga (2017, toyline)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_bravo)Sengoku Driver (Bravo)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by $(l:gaim/riders/gaim)Gaim,$(/l) $(l:gaim/riders/ryugen)Ryugen,$(/l) $(l:gaim/riders/zangetsu)Zangetsu,$(/l) $(l:gaim/riders/bravo)Bravo,$(/l) and $(l:gaim/riders/knuckle)Knuckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength II

pages.title: Kamen Rider Bravo
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbarizing (2013, arcade game)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_bravo)Sengoku Driver (Bravo)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Armored Rider$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength
